name: Master of the Elements
description:
You are a wizard protecting your island from vicious and relentless attacks of block vikings! Made for the 200th weekly game jam.

Features

A wizard shooting 4 different elements, which have different effects on different objects. You can set trees on fire to then shoot them with air to multiply your fire projectiles and much more!

Control
Walk with W, A, S, D
Shoot with your mouse
You have two elements avaible at all times. Switch between them with 'e'.

Your elements have ammo. Once an element runs out of ammo you automatically switch to the next element.

Credits:

Background art: tigersonalex https://twitter.com/tiggersongalex
Design / Code: Missing The Moon
Music: Carter Heitkamp @cdheitka

We used art from Pixel Art Medieval Fantasy Characters Pack 
And Sound effects from CanariPack 1BIT TopDown

Random Note

We switched out the music a day after the jam. The music was done and send to me before the jam ended, but I didn't had access to the google drive. And the musician went to bed after sending it to me xD
